alert.note: Alert for Putnam (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 5:40AM EDT until April 07 at 1:29PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County. For the Little River...including Newborn, Eatonton...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little River near Eatonton. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the river of the Oconee National Forest upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia Highway 16 or Monticello Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 20.1 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.5 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
